welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Brunoy, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and rich history. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take the time to explore and experience all that Brunoy has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Orly Airport's main terminal, serving mostly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Orly Airport's second terminal, serving mostly international and long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but it may require periodic reconnection.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and business flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Divided into seven sub-terminals, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection every 15 minutes.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
